definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)

sentences.english: The first edition of the Yi Quan Lake Winter Swim Cultural Festival took place on January 16.
sentences.chinese: 这是于1月16号举办的首届溢泉湖冬季游泳文化节。

sentences.english: China's cities and provinces are gearing up for the country's first national tourism day.
sentences.chinese: 国内各省市都在紧锣密鼓的迎接首届国家旅游日。

sentences.english: Now the frist Oral English Competition of Caijia Primary Schooll is over.
sentences.chinese: 蔡家小学首届英语口语比赛到此全部结束。

sentences.english: 1959 - The first Grammy Awards are announced.
sentences.chinese: 1959年的今天，首届格莱美大奖宣布。

sentences.english: The next year in 2006, Chiang Mai Tzu Chi School held its first graduation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 清迈慈济学校并在2006年，举办首届结业典礼。

sentences.english: That inaugural Olympic road race was held on the marathon course.
sentences.chinese: 首届奥运会自行车公路赛是在马拉松的赛道上进行的。

sentences.english: The first Westminster show was held in 1877.
sentences.chinese: 首届西敏寺犬展于1877年举办。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Li Peng attended the first Asia-Europe summit.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏总理出席了首届亚欧首脑会议。

sentences.english: Knight Frank is prv oud tom present our first international property exhibition in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 莱坊国际十分荣幸的向大家推出首届房地产博览会。

sentences.english: Brazil is an ideal place to host this first event of its kind.
sentences.chinese: 巴西是主办首届此类会议的一个理想场所。

sentences.english: It was the First Kite Festival in Hainan.
sentences.chinese: 这是海南的首届风筝节。

sentences.english: Spain's first national siesta championship is being held in Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙首届国家午睡锦标赛正在马德里举行。

sentences.english: The sun is shining, we welcome the 1st English festival of Exi Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 今天，阳光明媚，我们迎来了鹅溪小学首届英语节。

sentences.english: Be named to be by round provincial Party committee recently " Yunnan saves expert of first youth station " .
sentences.chinese: 最近被团省委命名为“云南省首届青年岗位能手”。

sentences.english: I am delighted to attend the first Lanting Forum. Lanting, as you may know, means the blue hall in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴参加首届“蓝厅论坛”活动。

sentences.english: 《9》 China, Fujian Province Fuzhou first session lantern festival in south back street grand hold.
sentences.chinese: 中国，福建省福州市首届灯会在南后街盛大举行。

definition: to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
